titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a joint resolution (H.J.Res. 175) to impose a moratorium on United States assistance for the Nicaraguan democratic resistance until there has been a full and adequate accounting for previous assistance.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-21.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 227 - 198 (Record Vote No: 28).

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 175 (moratorium on assistance to Nicaraguan resistance).
